reviews.review: Bl Htee Gud :3 (very good)
Buen juego, entretenido y estresante jeje

There really is a fun core game here, and I wish it could shine through all of the bulls**t but it can't. Aside from the fact that killers are overpowered. They are often the players that dictate the amount of fun that anyone else in a game can have. The devs constantly add fun and interesting addons for killers and release garbage bottom tier perks for survivors. As a survivor you have to play with a specific set of meta perks to even have a chance to win without a group. and often a killer can and will "Facecamp" or "Tunnel" you. The community is beyond toxic on both sides. Every end game lobby is filled with disgusting racist text. And the devs think the game is going in a great direction. I suggest you avoid this heap of trash unless you want to play as a killer specifically. If that is the case just leave the end game lobby as soon as the game is over and it can be a fun game, even if nobody else you are playing with is having any fun.

Kesinlikle herkesin oynaması gereken bir oyun. Hem tek başınıza hem arkadaşlarınızla oynana bilecek ve keyif alına bilecek oyunlardan birtanesi. Oyunun ucuz ve içerik mağazasının diğer oyunlara nazaran daha ucuz olması ve kesinlikle Para yatırıp kazan ( p2w ) bir oyun değil sadece karakter kozmetiği için para yatıra bilirsiniz yada oyun içi kazandığınız puanlarla kozmetik ala bilirsiniz. Eğer yeni başladıysanız ekleye bilirsiniz seve seve yardımcı olurum :))

Dedicated servers are garbage, bugs after newest patch and have persisted for weeks now and they refuse to do anything about except say "they're aware". Event challenges hardly ever register or you just randomly get them without doing anything. Most toxic gaming community. Unbalanced match making system and takes too long from times of 5 minutes to 20 minutes. No punishment for quitting. This game is absolute trash and wish I could get my money and time back.

Судя по моим часам в игре, я могу уже спокойно сказать что из себя представляет данный продукт.
Сразу хочу подметить, что игра не для всех, так как может порадовать (на момент написания обзора) всего 2мя режимами: выживший и маньяк. Думаю никому не надо рассказывать чем они отличаются и какие у них особенности. Игру стоит покупать если: 1 У вас уже есть друг с данной игрой. 2 Ваш друг купит её позже.
На данный момент это самая лучшая игра про выживших и маньяков по сети.
Рекомендую для компании.
Tremendo gameplay y buena ambientacion, perfecta para jugar con amigos

Of course, this game is extremely exhilarating, but there can be a few issues that follow along with this game. There is a level of toxicity that lingers throughout this computerized game. Most of it is against the game play of the killer or against the survivor. Examples of this could be face camping/camping, 
 continuous slugging, indefinite tunnel until dead, killer standing on your body, etc. You can think of many ways to harass a player through your 'gaming style'. The Dead by Daylight developers have tried their best to create perks that try to counter these types of issues, which I believe is awesome, but that's my only concern in the game.
